description: Defines a custom Flutter widget called PillFilterChip, which is a styled toggle button resembling a pill shape that wraps around Flutter's ChoiceChip. It allows toggling selection state with custom colors and styles.

classes.name: PillFilterChip
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a customizable pill-shaped toggle chip with styling based on selection state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the pill filter chip, utilizing ChoiceChip with custom styles and behavior.
